metadata.title: CVE-2019-6130 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0 has a SEGV in the function fz_load_page of the fitz/document.c file, as demonstrated by mutool. This is related to page-number mishandling in cbz/mucbz.c, cbz/muimg.c, and svg/svg-doc.c.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.0+ds1-3').
